name: Beat Hop - Music tiles
description:
Beats Hop is music tap game where you need to tap on the tiles and make ball dancing! Try to tap accurately and you'll create a new melody.
Easy to play: Tap the screen and drag left or right to avoid failing and lead the ball from tile to tile. Be attentive and quick! When the ball is jumping music is playing.

- Offline rhythm game
- Free music game
- Fit for kids
- Unique tracks (dubstep, drum n bass)
- Amazing 3D world
- High-quality sounds
